name: Island Media Management
description:
Island Media Management is a full service marketing company. We find ways to help business owners and managers develop their businesses. We provide customized solutions by assessing business performance and identifying opportunities to improve. We use data to define appropriate goals and create strategies to meet them. We then provide marketing services directly to our clients or via consultation and training.
Direct services include SEO, SEM, Social Media Management, Brand Management, website design, and mobile application development.
